posts.title: New Title Edited
posts.summary: I am really doing great with reactjs
posts.body: Dear Recipient, Once upon a time, in a land far away, there was a magical forest. This forest was inhabited by creatures of all shapes and sizes, each with their own unique abilities. Among these creatures, there was a tiny hummingbird named Flutter. Flutter was known for her vibrant colors and swift movements, but she was also known for her kindness and generosity. One day, a terrible storm hit the forest. The wind was so strong that it uprooted trees and the rain was so heavy that it flooded the rivers. All the creatures were terrified and took shelter. However, Flutter, despite her small size, decided to help. She flew around the forest, checking on everyone and offering her assistance. She comforted the scared, helped the injured, and provided food for the hungry. After the storm, the forest was in ruins. But thanks to Flutter's efforts, no one was hurt. The creatures of the forest were grateful for her bravery and kindness. They realized that no matter how small you are, you can make a big difference. From that day forward, Flutter was not just known for her colors and speed, but also for her courage and heart. And the forest, despite its scars, thrived once again, stronger and more united than ever. Best, Kiran Rai

posts.title: Parth is handsome
posts.body: Once upon a time, in a land far away, lived a brave warrior named Parth. Parth was known for his courage and kindness. His heart was as vast as the ocean, filled with compassion for every creature. He was a beacon of hope for his people, always standing up against injustice. His sword was his ally, and his courage, his shield. Parth's tales of bravery echoed in every corner of the kingdom. He was a hero, not because he never fell, but because he always rose after every fall. His spirit was indomitable, his resolve, unbreakable. Parth was a true hero, a symbol of courage and kindness.

posts.title: What is the Title
posts.summary: This is surely a dummy Title
posts.body: Greetings! Once upon a time, in a land not too far away, there was a magical tool named "Templates". This tool was no ordinary one, it had the power to save time and energy for all who used it. It was a beacon of efficiency, illuminating the path for those who wrote frequent messages. One day, a new tool emerged, known as "Triggers". It was named "-triggers", a peculiar name, but it held the power to insert templates with just a simple command. The people were amazed and began to experiment with -triggers, watching in awe as their messages transformed. Then came another marvel, "Macros". This tool had the ability to dynamically customize messages, adapting to whoever used it. It was a game-changer, making messages more personal and unique. The people rejoiced, their messages were now efficient, dynamic, and personal. They spread the word about these magical tools, sharing them with their teammates and friends. The land was filled with the sound of keys clicking, as everyone typed out ;macros and -triggers, creating their own magical messages. And so, the story of Templates, Triggers, and Macros continues, making the world of messaging a little bit easier, one word at a time. Best Regards, Kiran Rai

Best regards, Kiran Rai.

posts.body: Hello there! It's Kiran here. I hope this message finds you well. I just wanted to share how much I appreciate the convenience of using templates and triggers. It's a game-changer, especially when it comes to saving time and maintaining consistency in communication. Keep up the great work!
